sentences.english: In the Tzu Chi Archive, there are many real life stories. One is about Mr.
sentences.chinese: 在慈济大藏经里面，有很多的故事，真人实事。

sentences.english: There are many parts in Buddhism Tipitaka especially talking about therapies of illness.
sentences.chinese: 佛教大藏经中就有不少专门介绍治疗疾病的经典。

sentences.english: In the Samyutta Nikaya he uses this principle to advise against adultery.
sentences.chinese: 在南传大藏经之中，这条原则被用来批判通奸。

sentences.english: Also Sweden received a special World Tipitaka Edition in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 同年，瑞典也收到了一套世界版《大藏经》。
